评论详情: Love this! The straps are adjustable, it fits well (TTS), hides my mommy tummy (thanks c-sections), and the colors are great! The hem brushes the top of my feet without dragging the ground.

Very excited about this dress! It fits exactly how I imagined, with the bonus of coming with a snap to have less cleavage if desired. The snap is not black, so its a stark contrast if not buttoned. The skirt does not have pockets, which might be the only downside. I may order in other colors I like it so much!

The slits in the bottom we're not revealing at all they were very hidden cuz the fabric overlapped but they were beautiful the fit was great the only thing I didn't like was the top and I was hoping to not have to wear a big padded bra and I hate strapless.
